com.citrix.netscaler.nitro.resource.config.gslb
Class gslbvserver_domain_binding

java.lang.Object
  com.citrix.netscaler.nitro.resource.base.base_resource
      com.citrix.netscaler.nitro.resource.config.gslb.gslbvserver_domain_binding

public class gslbvserver_domain_binding
extends base_resource

Binding class showing the domain that can be bound to gslbvserver.

set_cookie_domain

public void set_cookie_domain(java.lang.String cookie_domain)
                       throws java.lang.Exception
 The cookie domain for the GSLB domain. This will be used when inserting the GSLB site cookie in the HTTP response. By default, cookie domain will not be inserted.
 Minimum length =  1
